verses.verse: Now<WG1161> in the fifteenth<WG4003> year<WG2094> of the reign<WG2231> of Tiberius<WG5086> Caesar,<WG2541> when Pontius<WG4194> Pilate<WG4091> was governor<WG2230> of Judea,<WG2453> and Herod<WG2264> was tetrarch<WG5067> of Galilee,<WG1056> and his brother<WG80> Philip<WG5376> was tetrarch<WG5067> of the region<WG5561> of Ituraea<WG2484> and Trachonitis,<WG5139> and Lysanias<WG3078> was tetrarch<WG5067> of Abilene,

in the high<WG749> priesthood<WG749> of Annas<WG452> and Caiaphas,<WG2533> the word<WG4487> of God<WG2316> came<WG1096> to John,<WG2491> the son<WG5207> of Zacharias,<WG2197> in the wilderness.<WG2048>
And he came<WG2064> into all<WG3956> the district<WG4066> around<WG4066> the Jordan,<WG2446> preaching<WG2784> a baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for the forgiveness<WG859> of sins;<WG266>

as it is written<WG1125> in the book<WG976> of the words<WG3056> of Isaiah<WG2268> the prophet,<WG4396> "The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in the wilderness,<WG2048> 'Make<WG2090> ready<WG2090> the way<WG3598> of the Lord,<WG2962> Make<WG4160> His paths<WG5147> straight.<WG2117>

'Every<WG3956> ravine<WG5327> shall be filled<WG4137> up, And every<WG3956> mountain<WG3735> and hill<WG1015> shall be brought<WG5013> low;<WG5013> And the crooked<WG4646> shall become<WG1510> <WG1519> straight,<WG2117> And the rough<WG5138> roads<WG3598> smooth;<WG3006>
And all<WG3956> flesh<WG4561> shall see<WG3708> the salvation<WG4992> of God.<WG2316>'"

He therefore<WG3767> [began] saying<WG3004> to the multitudes<WG3793> who were going<WG1607> out to be baptized<WG907> by him, "You brood<WG1081> of vipers,<WG2191> who<WG5101> warned<WG5263> you to flee<WG5343> from the wrath<WG3709> to come<WG3195>?

"Therefore<WG3767> bring<WG4160> forth<WG4160> fruits<WG2590> in keeping<WG514> with repentance,<WG3341> and do not begin<WG757> to say<WG3004> to yourselves,<WG1438> 'We have<WG2192> Abraham<WG11> for our father,<WG3962>' for I say<WG3004> to you that God<WG2316> is able<WG1410> from these<WG3778> stones<WG3037> to raise<WG1453> up children<WG5043> to Abraham.<WG11>

"And also<WG2532> the axe<WG513> is already<WG2235> laid<WG2749> at the root<WG4491> of the trees;<WG1186> every<WG3956> tree<WG1186> therefore<WG3767> that does not bear<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit<WG2590> is cut<WG1581> down<WG1581> and thrown<WG906> into the fire.<WG4442>"
And the multitudes<WG3793> were questioning<WG1905> him, saying,<WG3004> "Then<WG3767> what<WG5101> shall we do<WG4160>?"

And he would answer<WG611> and say<WG3004> to them, "Let the man who has<WG2192> two<WG1417> tunics<WG5509> share<WG3330> with him who has<WG2192> none;<WG3361> and let him who has<WG2192> food<WG1033> do<WG4160> likewise.<WG3668>"
And [some] tax-gatherers also<WG2532> came<WG2064> to be baptized,<WG907> and they said<WG3004> to him, "Teacher,<WG1320> what<WG5101> shall we do<WG4160>?"
And he said<WG3004> to them, "Collect<WG4238> no<WG3367> more<WG4183> than<WG3844> what you have been ordered<WG1299> to."

And [some] soldiers<WG4754> were questioning<WG1905> him, saying,<WG3004> "And [what<WG5101> about] us, what shall we do<WG4160>?" And he said<WG3004> to them, "Do not take<WG1286> money<WG1286> from anyone<WG3367> by force,<WG1286> or<WG3366> accuse<WG4811> [anyone] falsely,<WG4811> and be content<WG714> with your wages.<WG3800>"

Now<WG1161> while the people<WG2992> were in a state<WG4328> of expectation<WG4328> and all<WG3956> were wondering<WG1260> in their hearts<WG2588> about<WG4012> John,<WG2491> as to whether<WG3379> he might be the Christ,<WG5547>

John<WG2491> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> to them all,<WG3956> "As for me, I baptize<WG907> you with water;<WG5204> but One is coming<WG2064> who is mightier<WG2478> than I, and I am<WG1510> not fit<WG2425> to untie<WG3089> the thong<WG2438> of His sandals;<WG5266> He will baptize<WG907> you with the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> and fire.<WG4442>

"And His winnowing<WG4425> fork<WG4425> is in His hand<WG5495> to thoroughly<WG7039> clear<WG7039> His threshing<WG257> floor,<WG257> and to gather<WG4863> the wheat<WG4621> into His barn;<WG596> but He will burn<WG2618> up the chaff<WG892> with unquenchable<WG762> fire.<WG4442>"
So<WG3767> with many<WG4183> other<WG2087> exhortations<WG3870> also<WG2532> he preached<WG2097> the gospel<WG2097> to the people.<WG2992>

But when Herod<WG2264> the tetrarch<WG5068> was reproved<WG1651> by him on account<WG4012> of Herodias,<WG2266> his brother's wife,<WG1135> and on account<WG4012> of all<WG3956> the wicked<WG4190> things<WG4190> which<WG3739> Herod<WG2264> had done,<WG4160>
he added<WG4369> this<WG3778> also<WG2532> to them all,<WG3956> that he locked<WG2623> John<WG2491> up in prison.<WG5438>

Now<WG1161> it came<WG1096> about when<WG1722> all<WG537> the people<WG2992> were baptized,<WG907> that Jesus<WG2424> also<WG2532> was baptized,<WG907> and while He was praying,<WG4336> heaven<WG3772> was opened,<WG455>

and the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> descended<WG2597> upon Him in bodily<WG4984> form<WG1491> like<WG5613> a dove,<WG4058> and a voice<WG5456> came<WG1096> out of heaven,<WG3772> "Thou art<WG1510> My beloved<WG27> Son,<WG5207> in Thee I am<WG2106> well-pleased."

And when He began<WG757> His ministry, Jesus<WG2424> Himself<WG846> was about<WG5616> thirty<WG5144> years<WG2094> of age,<WG2094> being<WG1510> supposedly<WG3543> [the] son<WG5207> of Joseph,<WG2501> the [son] of Eli,<WG2242>
the [son] of Matthat,<WG3158> the [son] of Levi,<WG3017> the [son] of Melchi,<WG3197> the [son] of Jannai,<WG2388> the [son] of Joseph,<WG2501>
the [son] of Mattathias,<WG3161> the [son] of Amos,<WG301> the [son] of Nahum,<WG3486> the [son] of Hesli,<WG2069> the [son] of Naggai,<WG3477>
the [son] of Maath,<WG3092> the [son] of Mattathias,<WG3161> the [son] of Semein,<WG4584> the [son] of Josech,<WG7100> the [son] of Joda,<WG7099>
the [son] of Joanan,<WG7097> the [son] of Rhesa,<WG4488> the [son] of Zerubbabel,<WG2216> the [son] of Shealtiel,<WG4528> the [son] of Neri,<WG3518>
the [son] of Melchi,<WG3197> the [son] of Addi,<WG78> the [son] of Cosam,<WG2973> the [son] of Elmadam,<WG1678> the [son] of Er,<WG2262>
the [son] of Joshua,<WG2424> the [son] of Eliezer,<WG1663> the [son] of Jorim,<WG2497> the [son] of Matthat,<WG3103> the [son] of Levi,<WG3017>
the [son] of Simeon,<WG4826> the [son] of Judah,<WG2455> the [son] of Joseph,<WG2501> the [son] of Jonam,<WG2494> the [son] of Eliakim,<WG1662>
the [son] of Melea,<WG3190> the [son] of Menna,<WG3303> the [son] of Mattatha,<WG3160> the [son] of Nathan,<WG3481> the [son] of David,<WG7035>
the [son] of Jesse,<WG2421> the [son] of Obed,<WG7098> the [son] of Boaz,<WG1003> the [son] of Salmon,<WG4533> the [son] of Nahshon,<WG3476>
the [son] of Amminadab,<WG284> the [son] of Admin,<WG7002> the [son] of Ram,<WG689> the [son] of Hezron,<WG2074> the [son] of Perez,<WG5329> the [son] of Judah,<WG2455>
the [son] of Jacob,<WG2384> the [son] of Isaac,<WG2464> the [son] of Abraham,<WG11> the [son] of Terah,<WG2291> the [son] of Nahor,<WG3493>
the [son] of Serug,<WG4588> the [son] of Reu,<WG4466> the [son] of Peleg,<WG5317> the [son] of Heber,<WG1443> the [son] of Shelah,<WG4527>
the [son] of Cainan,<WG2536> the [son] of Arphaxad,<WG742> the [son] of Shem,<WG4590> the [son] of Noah,<WG3575> the [son] of Lamech,<WG2984>
the [son] of Methuselah,<WG3103> the [son] of Enoch,<WG1802> the [son] of Jared,<WG2391> the [son] of Mahalaleel,<WG3121> the [son] of Cainan,<WG2536>
the [son] of Enosh,<WG1800> the [son] of Seth,<WG4589> the [son] of Adam,<WG76> the [son] of God.<WG2316>
